gt_summary: Use a formula to factor out the largest common factorial. Rewrite the equation, showing the common factorial as a squared value. Multiply the remaining factors.
pred_summary: The formula for factorial multiplication is n!=n×(n−1)!{\displaystyle n!=n\times (n-1)!}. When multiplying two factorials, the largest common factorial is the smaller of the two factorials, and the result will be the product of the two original factorials. For example, 5!×7!{\displaystyle 5!\times 7!} = 7×6×(5!)2{\displaystyle =7\times 6\times (5!)^{2}} = 42×(120)2{\displaystyle =42\times (120)^{2}}

Fold the obijime over the obi. Attach the head to the body. Create hair from black cardstock. Adhere the hair to the head. Step back and admire your work.
pred_summary: To create a paper Hina Matsuri doll, start by cutting a small head and body from white or ivory cardstock. Next, fold a piece of chiyogami paper into a kimono shape and attach it to the body, leaving a small gap at the top. Finally, add an obi and obijime to complete the doll's outfit.

gt_summary: Get a referral for a specialist eye clinic from your optometrist. Learn the possible risks of laser eye surgery. Allow the eye surgeon to perform laser eye surgery. Recover
pred_summary: Laser eye surgery is a procedure that uses a beam of light to reshape the cornea of your eye to correct astigmatism. The cost of the surgery can range from $300 to $4,000 USD per eye and may not be covered by health insurance. Most people can drive and return to work 1-2 days after surgery, but it may take several weeks for issues like dry eyes, double vision, and glare to clear up completely.

This can be achieved by limiting the amount of fiber in each meal or snack, choosing lower fiber options, and avoiding fiber supplements.

gt_summary: Allow the jeans to soak for 30 minutes to an hour. Hang your jeans up to dry overnight.
pred_summary: The best way to remove stubborn stains from jeans is to use a mixture of soap and water. Swirl the jeans around in the mixture until suds form, then soak them for up to an hour before hanging them outside or in a breezy place to dry. After drying, the jeans may be stiff, so wear them for 20-30 minutes to loosen them up.

gt_summary: Discuss the importance of minimalism as a family. Identify the areas of your home that could be minimized. Assess your personal possessions. Examine your family’s daily schedule.
pred_summary: To adopt a minimalist lifestyle, it is important to have a family meeting to discuss the benefits of minimalism and how it will positively impact each member of the family. During the meeting, identify areas of clutter in the home and create a list of items to get rid of, sell, or give away. Additionally, consider reducing the amount of time spent on activities that drain energy and money, and instead focus on spending quality time together as a family.

gt_summary: Learn what soldering is. Use solder to bind things. Use a soldering iron to heat the solder. Use other equipment to assist in soldering. Turn on the lights. Prepare adequate ventilation. Don't solder for too long in one sitting.
pred_summary: Soldering is the process of melting a metal onto other metal components to bind them together. It differs from welding in that a softer metal with a lower melting point is used to connect the components. Soldering is useful for delicate applications such as electronics work or plumbing, and it can be used to fill in gaps or hold pieces in place.

gt_summary: Choose a leg and gently pull it out. Secure one of his/her nails. Pick up the nail clippers with your other hand. Identify the quick in the nail. Trim the nail. Proceed with trimming the rest of your guinea pig's nails. Put your guinea pig back in his/her cage and tidy up the nail trimmings.
pred_summary: Guinea pigs need their nails trimmed regularly to prevent overgrowth, but they can be skittish during this process. To trim their nails safely, hold the leg steady with one hand and use the other hand to trim the nail, taking care not to cut the quick. If you accidentally cut the quick, apply styptic powder or cornstarch to stop the bleeding.

gt_summary: Change pillowcases and bedding once per week. Use linen spray. Machine wash pillows at least twice per year. Go to bed with a clean face and hair.
pred_summary: Pillows should be washed at least once a week, or more frequently if the bed's owner sweats or wears makeup to bed. Regularly rotating sheets can keep the mattress and pillows clean, and using linen spray can help keep the pillows fresh and clean in between washes. It is recommended to machine-wash pillows every 3-6 months, depending on body composition and sleep habits.

gt_summary: Shift your car into reverse gear. Begin to back your car up. Turn your wheel sharply.
pred_summary: This method of driving is only recommended for those with a manual transmission car and requires the use of the clutch, accelerator, and steering wheel. The process involves turning the steering wheel in one direction while shifting the car into reverse and then releasing the clutch to cause the front wheels to lose grip and slide, while simultaneously jerking the steering wheel in the opposite direction to generate pressure against the body (lateral G force). After completing the donuts, the driver brings the steering wheel back to the center position and lowers the accelerator to around 20 mph before shifting back into park.

gt_summary: Deal yourself the top card by “second dealing” to the rest of the table. Deal your hand off the bottom of the deck. Stack the deck with the cards in order.
pred_summary: To stack the deck with the best cards on top, hold the deck in your palm with your thumb on top and slide the top card at an angle slightly off to the side. Practice this move slowly and increase the speed and decrease the distance as you improve. Keep the deck slightly tilted and use an overhand shuffle to float the cards you want to the top of the deck, then table shuffle the number of cards between the ones you want in your hand to stack the deck in your favor.

The Emtek lever or knob can be fixed by replacing the torsion spring and keyed washer, and tightening the bolt with an Allen wrench.

gt_summary: Avoid making your boss too dependent on your work. Take care of your boss’s ego. Resist over-specializing in your current position. Share the load and let others do some of the work.
